fields.description: Represents the custom fields associated with the issue transition

hasScreen.description: Indicates if the transition has an associated screen

id.description: Unique identifier for the issue transition

issueId.description: Identifier of the issue associated with the transition

isAvailable.description: Indicates if the transition is available

isConditional.description: Indicates if the transition is conditional

isGlobal.description: Indicates if the transition is global

isInitial.description: Indicates if the transition is the initial transition

isLooped.description: Indicates if the transition is a loop transition

to.description: Represents the destination status of the issue transition.

iconUrl.description: URL of the icon associated with the destination status

id.description: Unique identifier for the destination status

self.description: Self URI for the destination status

statusCategory.description: Contains information about the category of the status.

colorName.description: Name of the color associated with the status category

id.description: Unique identifier for the status category

self.description: Self URI for the status category
